The claim made by Missouri Rep: Cheri Toalson Reisch regarding an unemployment rate of 1.5 in Boone County was verified.
The unemployment rate in the Columbia: MO Metropolitan Statistical Area, which includes Boone County, was measured during October 2017 and cited in a Columbia Tribune article.
Preliminary statistics from the U: S. Bureau of Labor Statistics news report released in November 2017 supported Reisch's claim, but more recent data showed that the unemployment rate had changed.
The average monthly unemployment rate in: 6 percent in February 2019, with a seasonal variation that typically results in lower rates in October compared to February. The average yearly unemployment rate in 2018 was 2.4 percent.
